item.title: Contact us
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1540029051268{margin-bottom: -35px !important;}"][wwp_vc_gmaps disable_auto_zoom="false" zoom="15" height="500" custom_map_style="custom" styles="" streetview_control="true"][wwp_vc_gmaps_marker location_type="location" map_location="London" predefined_marker_icon="green"][/wwp_vc_gmaps][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1540029057399{margin-top: 35px !important;}"][contact-form-7 id="12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1540029061448{margin-top: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, conse ctetuer adipiscing elit." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%231a1a1a|line_height:30px" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452519698779{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]Etiam nulla nunc, aliquet vel metus nec, scelerisque tempus enim. Sed eget blandit lectus. Donec facilisis ornare turpis id pretium. Maecenas scelerisque interdum dolor in vestibulum proin euismod dui purus.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1460727902326{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;border-top-color: #e9e9e9 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e9e9e9 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]30 South Avenue San Francisco
Phone: +78 123 456 789
Email: Support@lifestyle.com
www.lifestyle.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
